articles.title: Joni Mitchell makes triumphant return to the stage - BBC
articles.description: Supported by a host of famous fans, the star played her first headline show in more than 20 years.
articles.content:
Joni Mitchell was showered with love on Saturday night, as she played her first headline show in more than 20 years.
Until recently, the chance of seeing the 79-year-old in concert had seemed like a… [+7336 chars]
